data.name: Class extension model with mixin ability.
data.description:
I always wanted to be able to extend my classes in a way closer to the classic programming languages and also to have the ability to decorate new classes with some other utility classes methods without having to add them in the inheritence chain. Idealy if I want to have a new class named className extended from superClass and having all the methods in the mixin as well, I should get it like this: extend(className, superClass[, mixin, scope]); where :
  • {String} className is the name of the class I want to define
  • {Function} superClass is the class I am extending from
  • {Function} mixin is an optional class from which, when specified, I am copying all the methods
  • {Object} scope is an optional argument giving the scope where the class should be defined. If not specified the gloabl scope will be used.
Your task will be to write this extend function.
